Package com.stuypulse.stuylib.input.keyboard

Class NetKeyboard

java.lang.Object
com.stuypulse.stuylib.input.keyboard.NetKeyboard
public class NetKeyboard
extends java.lang.Object
This class lets you send and receive keyboard information over network tables Every other class will interact with the network keyboards through this class

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    NetKeyboard​(int port)
    Creates NetworkKeyboard on robot
    NetKeyboard​(int team, int port)
    Creates NetworkKeyboard that is connected to the robot from elsewhere

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    boolean getKey​(java.lang.String key)
    Gets if key is pressed
    java.util.Set<java.lang.String> getKeysPressed()
    Returns Set of Strings with the names of every key that is pressed
    boolean isConnected()
    Checks if network table is connected
    void setKey​(java.lang.String key, boolean val)
    Set key value

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Constructor Details

    • NetKeyboard

      public NetKeyboard​(int port)
      Creates NetworkKeyboard on robot
      Parameters:
      port - virtual port number (unsure, use 0)

    • NetKeyboard

      public NetKeyboard​(int team, int port)
      Creates NetworkKeyboard that is connected to the robot from elsewhere
      Parameters:
      team - robot team number
      port - virtual port number (unsure, use 0)
